## Block.showListOfValues() method

Show the LOV associated with the field. Normally only 1 LOV can be active, force overrules this rule

**Signature:**

```typescript
showListOfValues(field: string, row?: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  field | string | The name of the field for which the LOV should be displayed. |
|  row | number | _(Optional)_ Optional parameter specifying the row number. |

**Returns:**

void
